intro: Psychotria neurocalyx, commonly known as the purple psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean and parts of Central America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, showy flowers that are typically purple or violet in color. Its leaves are usually elliptical and have a smooth texture. Psychotria neurocalyx is often found in humid, shaded environments such as tropical forests.
